resources.string: How to Play Tic Tac Toe
The goal is to be the first to form a line of three of your symbols (X or O) horizontally, vertically, or diagonally on the 3×3 grid.
• Play Offline: Play locally against yourself\n• Create Online Game: Host a game that others can join\n• Join Online Game: Enter a game ID to join a friend\'s game

1. X always goes first
2. Players take turns placing their symbol in an empty cell
3. Once a cell is filled, it cannot be changed
4. The game ends when:
 • A player forms a line of three symbols
 • All cells are filled (results in a draw)
5. In online mode, you must wait for your turn

1. The host creates a game and receives a game ID
2. The host shares this ID with a friend
3. The friend joins using this ID
4. The host clicks 'Start Game' to begin
5. Players take turns until the game ends

• Try to control the center cell
• If you can't win on your next move, block your opponent from winning
• Create opportunities for multiple winning lines
• Watch for diagonal opportunities - they're often overlooked
